imdb.plot outline: Revelations of an Authentic Woman is a new TV series that chronicles the issues women face in today's world and exposes the truth about the supposed perfect lives women project. RAW explores issues such as love, self-esteem and fear through the personal stories of the guests. Boldly introducing a new television genre, the talk-show meets documentary, RAW incorporates the one-on-one conversation element of a talk show with the authenticity of a documentary through its use of video journals.
imdb.title: Revelations of Authentic Women
plot: Revelations of an Authentic Woman is a new TV series that chronicles the issues women face in today's world and exposes the truth about the supposed perfect lives women project.
